suggestions.original: To enhance the line texture in the artwork, consider adding more detailed line work to the airplanes. This could include finer lines to depict the structure and features of the airplanes, such as windows, wings, and engines. Additionally, incorporating varied line thickness and patterns in the background elements, like the sky and ground, can add more depth and interest to the scene. Experimenting with different line techniques, such as cross-hatching or stippling, can also contribute to a richer texture overall.
